title: What is React?
content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable UI components.

title: What are Hooks?
content: Hooks let you use state and other React features in functional components without writing a class.

title: What is useState?
content: useState is a Hook that allows you to add state to a functional component.

title: What is useEffect?
content: useEffect lets you perform side effects in functional components such as data fetching or subscriptions.
